message: **Developer Notice:** Custom alerts can be set in the `alerts.json` file. You can use Markdown too, like _this_, **this**, or [this](/).
**Important:** Support for Pok√©API version 1 will end on 15 October 2018. If you're still using it, please switch to v2. [Read more...](/docs/v1.html)
Alerts marked as inactive will not be shown.
